T02TD3135E:301b-1: dh'a ra n'i sarba s'a dha na kra ma dva ya n'a ma /
T02TD3135E:302a-2: gzungs thams cad kyi sgrub thabs rim pa gnyis pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD3135E:302a-3: sgo drug zhi khro'i lha tshogs la //
T02TD3135E:302a-4: kun nas dang bas phyag 'tshal te //
T02TD3135E:302a-5: sanytsa la sogs don du ni //
T02TD3135E:302a-6: du ma gzungs kyi sgrubs thabs ni //
T02TD3135E:302a-7: spyi dang bye brag ldan tshul gyis //
T02TD3135E:302a-8: de ning yis bstan te bri //
T02TD3135E:302a-9: nyams dga' bde ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD3135E:302a-10: spyod gnyis ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD3135E:302a-11: dkyil 'khor chen po bsham par bya //
T02TD3135E:302a-12: ras ris mchod pa bsham par bya //
T02TD3135E:302a-13: bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te //
T02TD3135E:302a-14: snying gar zla dkyil h'um bsams te //
T02TD3135E:302a-15: de yi 'od kyis phyogs bcu yi //
T02TD3135E:302a-16: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas mdun du dgug / bdun po rnam dag rdzogs par bya //
T02TD3135E:302a-17: de rjes stong pa'i ngang la gnas //
T02TD3135E:302a-18: yam dang bam dang lam las ni //
T02TD3135E:302a-19: rlung mtsho rin chen sa gzhi bsam //
T02TD3135E:302a-20: de steng bhr'um zhu gzhal yas khang //
T02TD3135E:302a-21: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD3135E:302a-22: rta babs bzhi yis rnam mdzes pa //
T02TD3135E:302a-24: pho brang dbus kyi lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:302a-25: rang gi yi dam aom du bsam //
T02TD3135E:302a-27: slar 'dus gser gyi pu stir bsam //
T02TD3135E:302a-29: gtso chen pha rol phyin ma de //
T02TD3135E:302a-31: me tog pusti mnyam gzhag go //
T02TD3135E:302a-32: de nas zhi ba'i lha gnas su //
T02TD3135E:302a-33: pam las padma'i gdan du bsam //
T02TD3135E:302a-34: khro bo yi ni gnas rnams su //
T02TD3135E:302a-35: ma dang aa dang pam las ni //
T02TD3135E:302a-36: nyi zla padma'i gdan du bsam //
T02TD3135E:302a-38: las gnyis byas te lha gnas su //
T02TD3135E:302a-39: a'a: dang aom dang hr'i: dang aa //
T02TD3135E:302a-40: dkar ser dmar ljang zhi gnas su //
T02TD3135E:302a-41: h'um ni mthing nag 'phros nas su //
T02TD3135E:302a-43: las gnyis byas te slar 'dus pas //
T02TD3135E:302a-44: so so'i mtshan mar bsgom par bya //
T02TD3135E:302a-46: slar 'dus de nyid la thim pas//
T02TD3135E:302a-47: so so'i sku ru bsgom bya ste //
T02TD3135E:302a-48: dbus kyi 'dab ma rnams la ni //
T02TD3135E:302a-49: ye shes dbang bskur ldan ma dang //
T02TD3135E:302a-50: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma //
T02TD3135E:302a-51: rdo rje mi pham so sor 'brang //
T02TD3135E:302a-52: sdig pa spong ba gdugs dkar mo //
T02TD3135E:302a-53: bdud 'joms sgo mtha' sgrub pa ste //
T02TD3135E:302a-54: kun kyang sku mdog gser 'od la //
T02TD3135E:302b-0: @302b zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag nyid can //
T02TD3135E:302b-1: g-yas na ral gri g-yon me tog / kun kyang de thogs zhi 'dzum can //
T02TD3135E:302b-2: rin chen rgyan klubs bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:302b-3: shar gyi padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:302b-4: gser mdog sh'akya seng ge ste //
T02TD3135E:302b-5: skyil krung 'khor lo bsnams par bsam //
T02TD3135E:302b-6: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:302b-7: spyan ras gzigs dang byams pa dang //
T02TD3135E:302b-8: nam mkha'i snying po kun tu bzang //
T02TD3135E:302b-9: lag na rdo rje 'jam pa'i dpal //
T02TD3135E:302b-10: sgrib pa sel dang sa yi snying //
T02TD3135E:302b-11: dkar ser mthing ser yang mthing ser //
T02TD3135E:302b-12: ljang gu sngon po mdog yin no //
T02TD3135E:302b-13: kun kyang rgyan klubs me tog bsnams //
T02TD3135E:302b-14: 'dzum bag bzhin rgyas bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:302b-15: lho yi padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:302b-16: rig pa'i rgyal mo rma bya can //
T02TD3135E:302b-17: mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug ma //
T02TD3135E:302b-18: rma bya'i mjug sgo mda' dang ni //
T02TD3135E:302b-19: mchog sbyin rnams ni go rims g-yas //
T02TD3135E:302b-20: rin chen gzhu dang rnga yab bsnams //
T02TD3135E:302b-21: go rims bzhin du g-yon na'o//
T02TD3135E:302b-22: sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-23: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:302b-24: dang po'i 'dab ma stong chen mo //
T02TD3135E:302b-25: zhal gcig phyag drug dkar mo ste //
T02TD3135E:302b-26: ral gri mda' dang mchog sbyin rnams //
T02TD3135E:302b-27: go rims bzhin du g-yas na'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-28: zhags pa gzhu dang dgra sta bsnams //
T02TD3135E:302b-29: go rims bzhin du g-yon na'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-30: gnyis ba so sor 'brang ma ste //
T02TD3135E:302b-31: zhal bzhi ma la phyag brgyad ma //
T02TD3135E:302b-32: padma dang rgyan rtse gsum dang //
T02TD3135E:302b-33: 'dab brgyad dgra sta bcas pa la //
T02TD3135E:302b-34: ral gri padmar bcas pa dang //
T02TD3135E:302b-36: dang po gnyis g-yas tha ma g-yon //
T02TD3135E:302b-37: gsum pa bsil tshal mdog dmar po //
T02TD3135E:302b-38: zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD3135E:302b-39: phreng ba mchog sbyin g-yas na'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-40: rdo rje lcags kyu g-yon na'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-41: bzhi pa gsang sngags rjes 'dzin ma //
T02TD3135E:302b-42: ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma //
T02TD3135E:302b-43: rdo rje mchog sbyin g-yas na'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-44: dgra sta zhags pa g-yon na'o//
T02TD3135E:302b-45: kun kyang sna tshogs rgyan brgyan bsam //
T02TD3135E:302b-46: de dag bar gya 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:302b-48: mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras //
T02TD3135E:302b-49: dpa' bo yi ni cha lugs la //
T02TD3135E:302b-50: pi wang ral gri sbrul zhags dang //
T02TD3135E:302b-51: mchod rten phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3135E:302b-52: nub kyi padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:303a-0: @303a * // mgon po bde gshegs tshe dpag med //
T02TD3135E:303a-1: sku mdog dmar po ting 'dzin rgya //
T02TD3135E:303a-2: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303a-3: 'khor los sgyur rgyal bzang po mchog / gzi brjid can dang zla ba dang //
T02TD3135E:303a-4: snyan pa dri med bzang po tog / bkod pa chen po spyan ras gzigs //
T02TD3135E:303a-5: mthu chen thong ste de dag kyang //
T02TD3135E:303a-6: kun kyang dkar ser me tog bsnams //
T02TD3135E:303a-7: zhi ba 'dzum bag bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:303a-8: byang gi padma'i lte pa la //
T02TD3135E:303a-9: chos yum dmar ser pu sti gsum //
T02TD3135E:303a-10: me tog stong thogs 'dzum bag can //
T02TD3135E:303a-11: rgyan ldan pa ni bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:303a-12: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303a-13: gdugs dkar rnam rgyal gtsug gi nor //
T02TD3135E:303a-14: dri ma med pa'i gtsug tor te //
T02TD3135E:303a-15: dkar dang sngo bsangs dmar ser mdog / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ral gri dang //
T02TD3135E:303a-16: rin chen bsnams te 'dzum bag can //
T02TD3135E:303a-17: de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303a-19: ri khrod lo gyon dpal lung bstan //
T02TD3135E:303a-20: mthing ga gcig dang gzhan rnams ser //
T02TD3135E:303a-21: phyag bzhi d'urwa ltar sngo gcig / de yi phyag mtshan gyur pa ni //
T02TD3135E:303a-22: mchog sbyin 'bras bu dgra sta bsnams //
T02TD3135E:303a-23: zhags pa dbyug to g-yon na'o //
T02TD3135E:303a-24: ri khrod lo gyon dgra sta'o //
T02TD3135E:303a-25: 'od zer mya ngan med shing bsnams //
T02TD3135E:303a-26: me tog bsnams pa khro 'dzum bsam //
T02TD3135E:303a-27: byang shar padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:303a-28: bde gshegs tsandan yan lag ser //
T02TD3135E:303a-29: zhi des tsandan bsnams par bsam //
T02TD3135E:303a-30: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303a-31: blo yangs 'brug sgrogs sgrib pa sel //
T02TD3135E:303a-33: kun nas spos mchog rgyal mtshan rtsal //
T02TD3135E:303a-34: nga rgyal gnon dang rgya mtsho dbyangs //
T02TD3135E:303a-35: kun kyang dmar ser zhi tshul la //
T02TD3135E:303a-36: sa gnon pa yi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD3135E:303a-37: shar lho padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:303a-38: bde bar gshegs pa sgron ma mchog / ljang gu 'dzum bag sa gnon bsam //
T02TD3135E:303a-39: de yi phyogs kyi padma la //
T02TD3135E:303a-41: mi pham pa dang 'jam dpal dang //
T02TD3135E:303a-42: dri ma med dang rdo rje snying //
T02TD3135E:303a-43: rgyal ba can dang mtshan mo bzang //
T02TD3135E:303a-44: kun kyang dmar ser me tog 'dzum //
T02TD3135E:303a-45: lho nub padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:303a-46: mkha' lding gser gyi 'dab ma can //
T02TD3135E:303a-47: rdo rje'i mchu la lus 'bar ba //
T02TD3135E:303b-0: khro bo 'jigs @303b rung rtsal can la //
T02TD3135E:303b-1: rgyan brgyan klu la stan byas bsam //
T02TD3135E:303b-2: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303b-3: sbabs pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog /'bar ba'i gzi brjid gnam lcags mchu //
T02TD3135E:303b-4: dkar dmar ser dang sngon po ste //
T02TD3135E:303b-5: sbrul zan bzhi ni bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:303b-6: de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303b-7: khyab 'jug tshangs pa dbang phyug dang //
T02TD3135E:303b-8: drang srong ri byi bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:303b-9: nub byang padma'i lte ba la //
T02TD3135E:303b-10: mgon po spyan ras gzigs yum ni //
T02TD3135E:303b-11: dkar 'dzum me tog bsnams pa bsam //
T02TD3135E:303b-12: de yi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303b-13: spyan ras gzigs dbang bcu gcig zhal //
T02TD3135E:303b-14: phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa bsam //
T02TD3135E:303b-15: gzhan gyis mi thub rin chen phreng //
T02TD3135E:303b-16: stobs chen dang ni mdangs phyir 'phrog / kun kyang mdog dkar rin chen phreng //
T02TD3135E:303b-18: de yi bar gyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303b-19: gser can dang ni rnam rgyal can //
T02TD3135E:303b-20: 'gro lding pa dang dbyig dang ldan //
T02TD3135E:303b-21: ser dang dkar dang mthing ljang ngo //
T02TD3135E:303b-23: bcu drug pa yi 'dab ma la //
T02TD3135E:303b-24: rnam par gzigs dang thams cad skyob //
T02TD3135E:303b-25: log par dad sel gser thub dang //
T02TD3135E:303b-26: 'od srungs dang ni mar me mdzad //
T02TD3135E:303b-27: kun kyang zhi tshul sa gnon rgya //
T02TD3135E:303b-28: yongs grags dpal dang rin chen zla //
T02TD3135E:303b-29: gser bzangs dri med mya ngan med //
T02TD3135E:303b-30: chos bsgrags rga mtsho chos rgya mtsho //
T02TD3135E:303b-31: bee d'ura 'od kyi rgyal po ste //
T02TD3135E:303b-32: kun kyang nam mkha'i mdog lta la //
T02TD3135E:303b-33: sman mchog aa ru bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3135E:303b-35: snang ba mtha' yas de bsam bya //
T02TD3135E:303b-36: ser sngo dmar pa'i mdog yin no //
T02TD3135E:303b-38: sum cu rtsa gnyis rtsibs la ni //
T02TD3135E:303b-39: lag na rdo rje rnam 'joms dang //
T02TD3135E:303b-40: me ltar rmongs byed be con dang //
T02TD3135E:303b-41: kun kyang mthing ga khro bo'i cha //
T02TD3135E:303b-42: rdo rje be con bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3135E:303b-43: gzhon nu bsod nams rgyal mtshan ni //
T02TD3135E:303b-44: ae na'i lpags gyon sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02TD3135E:303b-45: dug gi me tog thogs pa'o //
T02TD3135E:303b-46: khro bo me yi kha la ni //
T02TD3135E:303b-47: mthing ga me dpung lag na thogs //
T02TD3135E:303b-48: tshogs bdag dkar po lcags kyu bsnams //
T02TD3135E:303b-49: rnam rgyal dbyug pa sngon po dang //
T02TD3135E:303b-50: gshin rje gshed dang mi g-yo mgon //
T02TD3135E:304a-2: bdud rtsi 'khyil dang khams gsum rgyal //
T02TD3135E:304a-3: kun kyang khro bo'i tshul can la //
T02TD3135E:304a-4: mthing ga rdo rje bsnams pa bsam //
T02TD3135E:304a-6: h'um k'a ra dang stobs po che //
T02TD3135E:304a-7: cha lugs gong dang mthun tshul la //
T02TD3135E:304a-8: 'khor lo gnyis kyi rtsibs la bsam //
T02TD3135E:304a-9: rgyal ba khyu mchog 'brog gnas dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-10: gangs gnas lnga rtse na nor bzangs dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-11: gang bzangs dang ni grags bzangs dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-12: sa mdzes dang ni phreng mdzes dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-13: kun kyang khro tshul gnas ser la //
T02TD3135E:304a-14: thams cad dbyug to bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3135E:304a-15: nag po che dang lha mo nag / dbyug to zhags pa thogs pa la //
T02TD3135E:304a-16: khro bo'i gzugs can bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:304a-17: rdo rje 'chang ni gtum mo dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-18: rdo rje khro mo pho nya mo //
T02TD3135E:304a-19: khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
T02TD3135E:304a-20: rig sngags khro bo rgyal ba can //
T02TD3135E:304a-21: kun kyang mthing ga khro tshul can //
T02TD3135E:304a-22: rdo rje rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud //
T02TD3135E:304a-23: de dag phyag na bsnams par bsam //
T02TD3135E:304a-24: khro bo bar du gcod sbyong dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-25: khro bo mi 'jigs sbyin pa ste //
T02TD3135E:304a-26: dkar ser khro tshul rdo rje bsnams //
T02TD3135E:304a-27: de yi phyi yi khyams la ni //
T02TD3135E:304a-28: gzungs rnams kun ni thams cad nas //
T02TD3135E:304a-29: mtshan brjod bde gshegs mtha' dag dmigs //
T02TD3135E:304a-30: lha mo sgo ba rang bzhin dmigs //
T02TD3135E:304a-31: de nas phyi yi rim pa ni //
T02TD3135E:304a-32: 'khor ba'i le tse khra bo la //
T02TD3135E:304a-33: gza' dgu dang ni rgyu skar ni //
T02TD3135E:304a-34: nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsam par bya //
T02TD3135E:304a-35: de yi phyi yi khyams la ni //
T02TD3135E:304a-36: du ma gzungs nas brjod pa yi //
T02TD3135E:304a-37: gnod sbyin klu la sogs pa yi //
T02TD3135E:304a-38: mthu chen thams cad dmigs par bya //
T02TD3135E:304a-39: sgo de rgal ba'i phyi rnams su //
T02TD3135E:304a-40: sna tshogs gzungs nas brjod pa yi //
T02TD3135E:304a-41: snying rje'i tshogs rnams thams cad dmigs //
T02TD3135E:304a-42: gal te bye brag sgrub byed na //
T02TD3135E:304a-43: tshogs gnyis gdan dang sa bon dang //
T02TD3135E:304a-44: gang bskyed pa yi sku de rnams //
T02TD3135E:304a-45: gong du mthun pa'i sku ru bskyed //
T02TD3135E:304a-46: de ltar bsbus te bye brag lha //
T02TD3135E:304a-47: gang 'dod pa ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD3135E:304a-48: de nas ye shes lha tshogs ni //
T02TD3135E:304a-49: nam mkhar bkug ste mchod nas ni //
T02TD3135E:304a-50: phyag rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya //
T02TD3135E:304a-51: sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02TD3135E:304a-52: de nas phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD3135E:304a-53: bum pa'i dbang ni bskur bar bsam //
T02TD3135E:304a-54: de ltar bur ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD3135E:304b-0: de @304b bskyed bzlas pa bya ba yin //
T02TD3135E:304b-1: thun mtshams gtor btang ye shes gshegs //
T02TD3135E:304b-2: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim pa ste dang po'o /
T02TD3135E:304b-4: // / de nas snying po bsdus pa'i rim pa ni /
T02TD3135E:304b-5: de ni rgyas pa btu bar bya //
T02TD3135E:304b-6: so so'i gzugs kyi nang nas te //
T02TD3135E:304b-7: sh'a ka thub yum gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-8: yi ge nyung na mu ne yin //
T02TD3135E:304b-9: lha mo brgyad kyi snying ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-10: lha mo brgyad kyi gzung nang nas //
T02TD3135E:304b-11: ye shes dbang bskur rdo rje dbyings //
T02TD3135E:304b-12: so sor 'brang gsum snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-13: so so;'i gzugs kyi nang nas ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-14: tha ma'i sarba man chad yin //
T02TD3135E:304b-15: gzhan rnams mi btu gzungs na bzhin //
T02TD3135E:304b-16: sems dpa' 'khor brgyad snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-17: dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:304b-18: yang na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi //
T02TD3135E:304b-19: nang gi gzungs rnams bzhin du'o //
T02TD3135E:304b-20: rma bya yi ni snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-21: rma bya'i snying po'i nang nas kyang //
T02TD3135E:304b-22: na ra ya yi sngags yin no //
T02TD3135E:304b-23: stong chen gyi ni snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-24: gzungs na sngags kyi tha ma'o //
T02TD3135E:304b-25: so sor 'brang ma'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-26: snying po gsum gyi sngags nang nas //
T02TD3135E:304b-27: rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o //
T02TD3135E:304b-28: bsil ba'i tshal gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-29: gzungs sngags gnyis pa yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:304b-30: gsang sngags gsum pa yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:304b-31: tshe dpag med kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-32: de mdo'i sarba sam sk'a ri //
T02TD3135E:304b-33: de yi 'khor gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-34: 'chi med rnga sgra'i sngags gzhug gi / aa mri ta yi sngags yin no //
T02TD3135E:304b-35: chos yum gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-36: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:304b-37: gdugs dkar snying po aa na le //
T02TD3135E:304b-38: tha ma'i sngags gzhug nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:304b-39: rnam par rgyal ma'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-40: gsang sngags de yi tha ma yi /
T02TD3135E:304b-41: sarba ta th'a mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:304b-42: gtsug gi nor bu'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-43: sngags de yi ni tha ma yi //
T02TD3135E:304b-44: sarba rnams gnyis mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:304b-45: gtsug tor dri med snying po ni /
T02TD3135E:304b-46: sngags de yi ni tha ma yi //
T02TD3135E:304b-47: sarba rnam gnyis mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:304b-48: 'od zer can gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-49: gzung sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:304b-50: pana'i snying po de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:304b-51: ri khrod lo gyon snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-52: tadya th'a nas bzung nas ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-53: sv'a h'a dang po yan chad do //
T02TD3135E:304b-54: dpal lha lung bstan snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-55: sngags de yi ni gzhung gi ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-56: tha ma'i sarba mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:304b-57: tsandan yan lag snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-58: de yi sngags kyi nang nas ni //
T02TD3135E:304b-59: sarba bh'u ta aa ti ta //
T02TD3135E:305a-2: bde gshegs bdun gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-3: khyad par can gyi mdo ji bzhin //
T02TD3135E:305a-4: nor gyi rgyun gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-5: sngags de yi ni tha ma yi //
T02TD3135E:305a-6: aom bzhi po ni yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-7: sgrol ma mchog gi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-8: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305a-9: mi pham 'jam dpal snying po yang //
T02TD3135E:305a-10: sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:305a-11: dri ma med pa'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-12: dri med gzungs sngags tha ma'o //
T02TD3135E:305a-13: rdo rje snying po de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:305a-14: rgyal ba can gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-15: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-16: mtshan mo bzang po'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-17: gzungs nas sngags kyi tha ma'o //
T02TD3135E:305a-18: mkha' lding gtso bo'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-19: tshangs pa khang par gzungs mthu yis //
T02TD3135E:305a-20: sngags rings de yi mjug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-21: ta th'a ga ta mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:305a-22: sbas pa rdo rje kun 'bar glog / mchu yi nang nas 'byung bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305a-23: 'bar ba gzi brjid snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-24: mchu yi gzungs sngags tha ma yi //
T02TD3135E:305a-25: aom di ri di ri mar bcad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-26: gnam lcags mchu yi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-27: gnam lcags sngags kyi tha ma yin //
T02TD3135E:305a-28: aom di ri di ri de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-29: ri byi'i sngags ni de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:305a-30: spyan ras gzigs yum snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-31: sarba gnyis po mar bcad yin //
T02TD3135E:305a-32: bcu gcig zhal gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-33: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305a-34: rin chen phreng ba'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-35: gzungs sngags gnyis pa yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-36: stobs can gyi ni snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-37: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-38: mdangs phyir 'phrog gi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-39: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305a-40: gser can gyi ni snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-41: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-42: rnam rgyal can gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-43: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-44: 'gro lding pa yi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-45: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-46: dbyig dang ldan pa'i snying po yang //
T02TD3135E:305a-47: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305a-48: bde gshegs rabs bdun snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-49: sangs rgyas bdun pa'i gzungs nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:305a-50: sman bla mched bdun snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305a-51: gzungs sngags bar ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305a-52: mi 'khrugs pa yi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-0: las sgrib sbyong ba'i gzungs nang gi / kam ka ni ni yin @305b par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-2: rgya chen thogs med gzungs nang gi / mjug gi sngags thung yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-3: snang mtha' yas kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-4: de yi gzungs sngags tha ma'o //
T02TD3135E:305b-5: lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-7: rnam par 'joms pa'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-8: de yi sngags kyi gzhug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-10: me ltar rmongs byed snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-11: sngags de yi ni nang nas ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-12: sarba de ba n'a ga man chad do //
T02TD3135E:305b-13: be con chen po'i snying bo ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-14: gzungs sngags dang po'i nang nas kyang //
T02TD3135E:305b-15: sarba aa ta sa ta na //
T02TD3135E:305b-16: de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-17: dug sel gyi ni snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-18: de dag gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-19: me kha la yi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-20: gzungs sngags dang po'i nang nas kyang //
T02TD3135E:305b-22: de ni mar chad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-23: tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-24: de yi gzungs kyi sngags gzhug gi /
T02TD3135E:305b-25: tadya th'a nas tha ma'i bar //
T02TD3135E:305b-26: khro bo bcu yi snying po yang //
T02TD3135E:305b-27: rang rang gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305b-28: yang na bskor ba'i gzungs bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305b-30: khro bcu'i sngags su 'dod pa yin //
T02TD3135E:305b-31: lag na rdo rje bcu yi ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-32: snying po gzungs sngags tha mar 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-33: nag po chen po'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-34: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305b-35: lha mo nag mo'i snying po yang //
T02TD3135E:305b-36: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:305b-37: rig sngags rgyal ba can nang nas //
T02TD3135E:305b-38: khro bzhi'i sngags ni btu bar bya //
T02TD3135E:305b-39: gtum po yi ni sngags gnyis las //
T02TD3135E:305b-41: rdo rje khro bo'i sngags de nyid //
T02TD3135E:305b-42: rdo rje pho nya mo yi sngags //
T02TD3135E:305b-43: mdung rtse gsum pa'i sngags yin no //
T02TD3135E:305b-44: khro bo lu gu rgyud sngags ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-45: gzungs kyi nang bzhin kho na'o //
T02TD3135E:305b-46: rig sngags rgyal ba can sngags ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-47: dza ya dza ye'i sngags yin no //
T02TD3135E:305b-48: khro bo bar du gcod sbyong sngags //
T02TD3135E:305b-49: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:305b-50: khro bo mi 'jigs sbyin sngags ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-51: sngags de nyid kyi nang nas kyang //
T02TD3135E:305b-52: sarba dur shar mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:305b-53: de dag lha mngon nang nas btu //
T02TD3135E:305b-54: gzungs chen po yi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:305b-55: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-0: sangs rgyas snying po'i snying po @306a * //
T02TD3135E:306a-2: / gzungs sngags dang bo yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-3: dbang phyug chen po dka' thub bzang //
T02TD3135E:306a-4: de la bcom ldan bka' stsal pa'i //
T02TD3135E:306a-5: sangs rgyas snying po'i gzungs sngags gzhug / sarba aa ka rnam gsum yin //
T02TD3135E:306a-6: dbang bskur gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-7: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306a-8: kun bzang gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-9: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-11: me tog brtsegs gzungs snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-12: sngags de nyid kyi nang nas kyang //
T02TD3135E:306a-13: aa mri ta ni mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:306a-14: sa dbang gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-15: sngags de yi ni gzhug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-16: sa myaka sam bud mar bcad do //
T02TD3135E:306a-17: yi ge drug pa'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-18: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-19: shes rab nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sgo //
T02TD3135E:306a-20: snying po aom du 'dod pa yin //
T02TD3135E:306a-21: mig sbyong gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-22: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306a-23: gzi can zhus pa de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306a-24: sangs rgyas yan lag snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-25: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-26: gzhang 'brum sel ba'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-27: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-28: sgo drug snying po de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306a-29: bu mang brton pa'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-30: de yi gzungs kyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306a-31: rims nad zhi gzungs de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306a-32: chos kyi rgya mtsho'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-33: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-34: sgo mtha' yas kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-35: sngags de yi ni mjug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-37: lus dbyibs mdzes gzungs snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-38: sngags de rang gi mjug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-39: ma h'a bo dhi satva dang //
T02TD3135E:306a-40: de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-41: dbugs chen gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-42: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-43: gza' rnams yum gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-44: gza' yum sngags kyi gzhug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-46: ri rab khang brtsegs snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-47: gzungs sngags tha ma yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-48: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-49: de rang mtshan gyi nang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306a-50: yangs pa'i grong khyer 'jug gzungs kyi //
T02TD3135E:306a-51: gsar sngags dang po bi sa ra //
T02TD3135E:306a-52: de yi snying po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306a-53: sangs rgyas bcu gnyis snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306a-54: mi btu de yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306b-0: sgo bzangs gzungs kyi @306b snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-1: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-2: nad rnams zhi gzungs snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-3: mi btu de yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306b-4: byang chub rgyan 'bum snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-5: sngags gzhug sarba man chad yin //
T02TD3135E:306b-6: n'i la kantha'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-7: sngags de yi ni mjug gi ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-9: de ni man chad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-10: lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag / ming brgyad gsang sngags bskor ba yis //
T02TD3135E:306b-11: de yi snying po de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306b-12: mdo sdong brgyan pa'i snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-13: gzungs sngags gsum po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-14: mchod pa'i sprin gyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-15: mi btu de yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306b-16: za ma tog gi phyag rgya yi //
T02TD3135E:306b-17: de yi gzungs kyi sngags gzhug gi / sarba man chad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-18: dra byi rig pa'i rgyal mo'i sngags //
T02TD3135E:306b-19: gzungs sngags dang po yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-20: sprin gyi gzungs kyi snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-21: bde sbyin sngags ni yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-22: rlung gi dkyil 'khor snying po ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-23: gzungs sngags tha ma'i nang nas kyang //
T02TD3135E:306b-24: na mo ratna tra y'a ya //
T02TD3135E:306b-25: de ni mar bcad yin par 'dod //
T02TD3135E:306b-26: aushn'i sha la sogs pa'i gzungs //
T02TD3135E:306b-27: snying po rang gzhung gsal ba yang //
T02TD3135E:306b-28: de yi gzungs kyang 'ga' zhig mchis //
T02TD3135E:306b-29: de dag ma btus de nang bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306b-30: de ltar sna tshogs gzungs nang nas ;
T02TD3135E:306b-31: / mkhas pas de ltar btu bar bya //
T02TD3135E:306b-32: snying po btu ba'i rim pa ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD3135E:306b-34: // / da ni rim gnyis mjug bsdus te //
T02TD3135E:306b-35: gong bzhin sgrub pa'i thabs bsgoms nas //
T02TD3135E:306b-36: snying po btu rim bzhin du ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-37: gtso bo nas ni 'khor gyi bar //
T02TD3135E:306b-38: rgyas dang 'bring dang bsdus pa yis //
T02TD3135E:306b-39: bsnyen pa tshad du bskyal bar bya //
T02TD3135E:306b-40: de nas las la sbyor ba ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-41: dbang bskur dus su rig sngags bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306b-42: khrus kyi cho ga'i dus su ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-43: kun khyab gzungs kyi cho ga bzhin //
T02TD3135E:306b-44: gzungs brjod mjug gi cho ga'i dus //
T02TD3135E:306b-45: rang gi cho ga'i gzhung bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:306b-46: de bzhin las la spyar bar bya //
T02TD3135E:306b-47: bye brag tu ni sgrub byed na //
T02TD3135E:306b-48: bye brag sgrub pa'i thabs bsgoms nas //
T02TD3135E:306b-49: bye brag snying po bzlas par bya //
T02TD3135E:306b-50: de nas las la sbyar ba ni //
T02TD3135E:306b-51: zhi ba rim drug gdon dgrol sogs //
T02TD3135E:306b-52: zhi ba'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD3135E:306b-53: drag po'i rim drug gdon dgrol sogs //
T02TD3135E:306b-54: drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02TD3135E:307a-1: khyab las sbyor thams cad kyis //
T02TD3135E:307a-2: las rnams thams cad mthar 'byung ba'o //
T02TD3135E:307a-3: gzhan las sogs pa'i gzungs rnams la //
T02TD3135E:307a-4: rten gyi gang zag mos byung na //
T02TD3135E:307a-5: de yi gzhung na lha gsal na //
T02TD3135E:307a-6: de gzhung bzhin du lhar bskyed de //
T02TD3135E:307a-7: de gzhung gsal bar ma gyur na //
T02TD3135E:307a-8: zhil bstan bdag drag po la //
T02TD3135E:307a-9: khro bo phyag na rdo rje la //
T02TD3135E:307a-10: bskyed tshul sgrub pa'i thabs bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:307a-11: las sbyor snying po gong bzhin no //
T02TD3135E:307a-12: de ltar sgrub pa'i thabs sbyangs nas //
T02TD3135E:307a-13: klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i //
T02TD3135E:307a-14: gdon rnams thams cad sel bar nges //
T02TD3135E:307a-15: mdze dang phol mig rims la sogs //
T02TD3135E:307a-16: nad rnams thams cad sel bar nges //
T02TD3135E:307a-18: sdig pa thams cad zad par byed //
T02TD3135E:307a-19: dri ma thams cad 'khrud par byed //
T02TD3135E:307a-20: sdig pa sbyong ba'i mchog yin no //
T02TD3135E:307a-21: phyi mar mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu //
T02TD3135E:307a-22: sgrub pa yi ni mchog yin no //
T02TD3135E:307a-23: de yi phan yon mang po ni //
T02TD3135E:307a-24: so so'i sna tshogs gzungs nang nas //
T02TD3135E:307a-25: rgyas shing gsal bar bstan pa ste //
T02TD3135E:307a-26: de dag de ru bltas te sgrub //
T02TD3135E:307a-27: phan yon de dag bden pa ste //
T02TD3135E:307a-28: sangs rgyas bka' ni mi slu ste //
T02TD3135E:307a-29: phan yon de dag thams cad ni //
T02TD3135E:307a-30: don tshig ldan la gzhung bzhin 'byung //
T02TD3135E:307a-31: tshig ldan pa la de yi cha //
T02TD3135E:307a-32: mkhas pas de ltar shes par gyis //
T02TD3135E:307a-33: rmongs pas de ltar ma shes pas //
T02TD3135E:307a-34: log pa'i the tshom za ba yin //
T02TD3135E:307a-35: de bas sgrub pa'i thabs 'di la //
T02TD3135E:307a-36: sgrub thabs grangs ni dpag med ldan //
T02TD3135E:307a-37: sna tshogs rgyud la brten byas nas //
T02TD3135E:307a-38: nor bu sgrub thabs rim gnyis 'di //
T02TD3135E:307a-39: rin chen grags pas bstan pa yin //
T02TD3135E:307a-40: de las dge ba ci thob pa //
T02TD3135E:307a-41: kun gyis gzungs kyi don rtogs shog / bdag gi bstan bcos rgyas gyur cig / slob dpon mkhas pa rin chen grags pas mdzad pa gzungs 'dus spyi'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD3135E:307a-43: // / bal po ma h'a p'a nas bsgyur ba'o /
